content.detailedDescription: Witness a, her mom and younger brother were driving home about 7:10 p.M. on the 8th of january 2008.  they topped a small hill and saw big scattered blinking lights in front of them very close to the ground.  the stopped the car and watched the lights blink on and off a few times.  then the lights lined up in front of them in a row and blinked out.  the lights were a bright yellow, very large and very bright.
content.summary: Witness driving in car saw five (5) large bright yellow lights in the sky that moved to form one even row the blinked out.

content.detailedDescription:
After seeing and listening to you on larry king's program the fourth week of september 2008, i decided to let you know what i saw once upon a time, mostly because i have not heard of any ufo described as what i thought i saw.  my report was sent to project bluebook soon after sighting this object on an early balmy september evening as i walked from my car to my house, which was on a corner, carrying a bag of groceries. i called to my daughter, who was with me, "to look up" as i ran into the house, dropped the sack of groceries, and ran back outside all the while thinking what i saw might have been light reflected from electrical wires attached to a telephone pole at the corner--but knew better because what i saw was much larger than a telephone wire.  i first saw the object when i happened to look up as i left my car and saw the object traveling slowly, quietly  and clearly from north to south across the intersection, and then i couldn't see it anymore because of all the tall trees on down the street.  i knew immediately it was something unusual that i was watching for a few seconds.  it was shaped exactly like a neon-tube lightbulb only larger, approximately from where i saw it just above tree tops before it crossed the intersection and disappeared above the many other trees along the street.  it was clearly visible against the dark sky, a brilliant yellow elongated object that made no sound and from my position on the street (and being seeminly so close just above the tree tops) to me measured about 10-12' long and 12-15" wide.  the circular shaped front end (couldn't see the back end, of course) and the elongated rest of the shape is what looked like a brilliantly lit neon tube. the next day i told my boss (and nobody else for years)who was a usda public information officer, first asking him "would you believe i think i saw a ufo last night?"  yes, he surely did, because he spent night-time hours looking for such objects and had been in contact with the well-known chicagoan named hynek (now deceased) who was interested in ufo sightings.  i have read william cooper's "behold a pale horse" and believe every word he wrote.  as you know, he lived near phoenix, and was murdered a few years ago.  i wrote to him after my first encounter early on when i lived in peoria, ill.,about the ufo but my mail was returned "unable to deliver."   

i also had an extremely interesting experience while driving in a storm that actually slowed my car down to about 15 miles/hour because of ferocious winds.  i lowered my window and looked quickly up at the sky where i saw a replica of a braided rug in shades of gray--coil after coil, but i could only see a portion of the "rug" because the rest of it was over my car top.  when i drove down a hill, which was where the road led, i saw cars parked under an overhead bridge, but i kept driving because the winds had subsided.  when i arrived home i heard radio news stating a tornado had passed over the area i was driving in about 15 minutes before.  i wrote to the people who made the movie about tornados a few years ago, telling them what i saw but rec'd no feedback.  wondering if you ever heard of such a sighting.
content.summary: Watched object pass over four-corner intersection.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo appeared to be round or oval flying in light low clouds at the bottom of the clouds so that the clouds swirled covering opposite sides giving the appearance of being oval shaped.  it was the night of the autumn solstice when the earth tilts north toward north northeast.  the ufo was flying from the south toward the north.  the moon was full and very bright.  the ufo did not have lights and was flying about 1200' altitude and about 1" long. my husband and i both saw the ufo and started viewing it after it had flown over our house and was about 75 degree angle to the north horizon. we watched until it disappeared into the clouds at about a 35 degree angle. the ufo flew silently and was cruising along at a slow speed.

my husband and i were standing on the patio talking. i notice someting moving up above where we were standing and knew it was a ufo immediately.  the ufo was flying silently and straight from south to north. we were excited to finally see a ufo close enough to know it was a ufo. i wondered how they communicate (language) and if they could read our minds and what kind of radar or detection equipment they have to be flying at night and if the ufo could detect people outdoors.  flying that low to the earth, it seems as if they were peaceful. what could they be searching for?
content.summary: Dark greyish-black pearl color

content.detailedDescription: Witness a was waiting in her pu truck about dusk for her husband to finish plowing  and when she looked up from reading a book, she saw six lights in the sky that appeared to be headlights.  they moved from her right to directly in front of her and disappeared like a light switch was turned off.  she saw no aircraft in the sky before or after the lights appeared and left.
content.summary: Six lights appeared in the sky and moved directly in front of the witness then disappeared

content.city: Green Bay or Neenah or Li
content.detailedDescription: Please refer to bindiroy"s story in the private site of personal experiences as there is not enough room here.  it is with the mufon sie.
content.summary: I thought the light was a star low in the sky and it was a ship
content.locationName: Green Bay or Neenah or Li, Wisconsin

content.detailedDescription:
At the approximate time and date stated above, i awoke to what first appeared to be a car pulling into the driveway of the stated residence. it looked as if headlights were coming through the window. the light quickly grew in intensity and as i began to try to sit up to investigate, an incredibly bright, white light with a light bluish hue shown into the room. at the same time i felt a high-frequency vibration inside of my body preventing my movement. what i felt was complete paralysis. an overwhelming fear came over me, and i tried to scream, and was unable to. as soon as i tried to scream for help, i felt my body being levitated and i could see the ceiling getting closer. when i was just a few inches away from the ceiling i heard what sounded like my own voice talking to me. (what my voice sounds like from my perspective, not like a recording). the first words that i understood were such that i should not be afraid because no harm would come to me. what happens from here forward is sort of fuzzy and i cannot recall absolute detail except for the following:

  as the encounter ended, i saw the ceiling getting further away and i felt myself sink back into bed. all at once, the vibration and bright light stopped. i checked the clock and it said something like 2:40. i was not able to view the clock prior to the encounter, but it seemed as though ten minutes had elapsed from start to finish. 

  the next morning i told my parents of the incident, who of course did not believe my statement. i have only told very few people about this encounter since it happened.
content.summary: Blinding white-blue light

content.detailedDescription:
My 6yr old daughter and i would lay in bed at night and read stories and look out our sky light earlier this month, when we noticed a bizaar object that appeard to be "hovering" over our lake although it also appeard to be very high in the sky it would often dart around as thought it was not in control of itself. then it appeared within a few minutes 4 to 6 some sort of aircraft would appear near it. then the object would dart randomly and appeard to be flashing lights towards the aircraft, very sharp and random lights would flash periodically. it was so bizaar that the first time we saw it we hardly even spoke to each other and just watched. after about 11 mintues or so it was late and she needed to get to sleep so we briefly discussed what we thought it to be, "she described it as a big light that would flash and that was chasing airplanes". i on the other hand, was very skeptical having never believed in ufo's or seen anything remotely close to this and was sure my eyes were playing tricks on me at the age of 43 and was even reluctant to tell my husband, for fear he would think i too was seeing things. however, that was not our only time to see it! it came back and this time i was a bit scared but the article from stephenville had not been posted/written and i decided i needed to tell someone, so the next morning we told my husband who laughed! again, it was late in the night and out our skyllight you could see the entire "light show". so this time i did get up and walk out to our balcony to see if i could hear anything, since we are in the flight path of both ellington field and houston hobby airport i thought it might be some weird aircraft i was not accustomed to seeing and wanted to see if i could hear anything, (whent he jets fly over it is very noisy and is true then large planes that are flying low due to landing or taking off) but the only sound was a bit of traffic off i-45. this time, i did ask my daughter "to describe to daddy what we saw the next morning". he of course laughed and said it was some star but she and i know that stars do not move, and if they are flashing lights they are generally falling and not back in the same spot later. also, it was clearly different than anything i have ever seen in my 43 years of living and i hope i do not see the "light show" again!  
my gut instinct says "it is not a military training mission" unless they have invented some sort of new unreleased aircraft that plays chase wtih them in the wee hours of night. if so, i am going to be very unhappy since gas prices are through the roof, couldn't and shouldn't we be saving that fuel for better use???   
sincerely,
ss. and family
content.summary: We saw a circle/s darting around spastically and shooting light out randomly

content.detailedDescription:
I had just come home from a dinner with friends and proceeded to let the dogs out in the back yard. at this residence we had a very large and open back yard with a great view of the sky. the clouds in the sky were very bright due to the city lights reflecting off of them. the cloud ceiling was very low and there was some light rain.

i walked out with the dogs and just looked up into the sky and saw the object traveling at a high rate of speed over the neighborhood from right to left. there were no running lights at all and no sound. this house was close to austin-bergstrom airport and i know what the aircraft looked like and their speed from watching them all the time. this object moved 3 times as fast as any aircraft. 

at this time i ran in to get my roommate and he was in the shower so i ran back out and it had disappeared after going behind a large tree in the distance. i never saw it again. 

in light of the recent events that have taken place here in texas, stephenville precisely i wanted to submit this account. although i did report it on the national ufo reporting center at the time i wanted to re-report it here. i was in the us air force for 12 years and graduated from texas state university and would hope that i am a well grounded person and i know what i saw and it was no earthly aircraft. i only which i had taken a photo but there was no time as it was gone in a flash. i will never forget that night and know as a matter of fact that there is something going on here in texas.
content.summary: Large solid black square with no lights

content.detailedDescription: While driving alone on a summer night in the country, i turned on a stretch of rural road, farmland, to make my way home.  as i turned onto the road i noticed a long light in the sky running parellel with the road.  as i drove i kept looking up at it and thought to myself that it was similuar to a spot light that those car dealers use to advertise with light in the sky, or maybe a train light--it was a strong beam of light that shot straight ahead in the sky which did not move. following the light looking for its source, i realized it was near the only house on that road, which is in a farm field.  driving closer i thought it must be a news helicopter, because it was hovering-not moving but staying in place with its light on, yet i thought how odd i don't hear any helicoptor--helicoptors have that loud chopper sound.  it wasn't a helicoptor and it was not a normal aircraft.  the homeowner has a cellphone tower  on his land and that is where this aircraft was--over the cellphone tower which is right next to his house before the farmland begins.  i couldn't help wonder if the people in the house knew what was near them.  it was low enough for me to see it but too far up for me to see any details except the lights and shape. as i began approaching the part of the road ahead where i would be directly under this thing i could not believe it wasn't moving and there wasn't any sound--this is when i saw its shape.  i looked up at it from my car window, as i drove, getting a look before the roof of my car blocked my view -- i did not dare stop.   the aircraft was in the form of a dark trangle with small lights on it's ends and the one large beam which lit up the sky ahead of it.   it never moved or made any sound-- it seemed to be  sitting above the cellphone tower, charging itself.  i never waited to see if it would leave, i just drove home quickly.  to this day i still wonder what it was and from time to time when i drive home late i appraoch that road with caution.
content.summary: Triangle in shape with a beam of light in front of it as it was hovering over cellphone tower

content.detailedDescription:
This event occurred in either april or may of 2000 during a military training excercise.  i was nearing the end of my fourth and final year of service as a tank crewman in the us army.
i was member of a three man tank crew setting up a "screenline" for the first day of a three day defensive mission.  we were part of the opfor or opposition forces that play the role of enemy nations and train other army units every month at fort irwin, aka ntc (national training center).
the purpose of a "screenline" is to have minimal forces (typically three or four vehicles) several kilometers in front of the main force to identify and destroy incoming scouts in the days prior to the main battle.  our tank was to be the farthest forward (east) vehicle in this formation. (see attached map for our position in association of other friendly troop formations).
due to mechanical difficulties (engine replacement) we were stuck in maintainance area (see circle near hill on map) until nearly midnight on the first night.  typically, only one or two scouts will try to penetrate the area at this time.  as we finally began to roll east just after midnight, we had to move extremely slow as there was no moonlight and our night vision had to rely on starlight for magnification purposes.  the driver has one set of night vision goggles, and the tank commander "mario" had the other pair.  both myself and the tank commander were standing out the open hatches on top of the tank to help guide the driver forward to our position.
about two kilometers into our trip (see first tick mark on our path), i noticed a fairly bright light well ahead of us along the horizon (due east).  assuming it was just a bright star, or even a planet i kept it to myself for several minutes as we continued to trudge along at only a couple of mile per hour.  as i continued to observe (with the naked eye), the object appeared to slowly be rising from the horizon, as if coming towards us, yet still at a great distance...  a few minutes later (see second tick mark), i tapped the tank commander who had the night vision goggles and pointed to the object.  he too noticed and both of us began to study the light as it slowly appeared to approach us.  several minutes later, we realized the object was going to be fairly close as it passed by the right side (south) of us.  without telling the driver what was going on (he was a young private, and we didn't want to look like weirdo's) we instructed him to stop the tank and shut down the engine so we could listen.  in the absolute silence of the desert in the early am, we were unable to hear any sound whatsoever as the object continued to approach.  we passed the night vision goggles back & fourth in complete disbelief (and a bit of fear i may add) as the object passed within a few hundred yards of our vehicle.  it was only about 30-40 feet off the ground, disk shapped, and through the night vision goggles, you could see a beam circulating beneath the object shining at the ground as it went by.
knowing that there weren't supposed to be any aircraft in the area and seeing that we couldn't identify what we saw, we hesitated to break radio silence for sake of not being taken seriously.
however a few minutes later several other units farther back in the formation reported "blue-air" (code name for blue forces aircraft).  but, quickly they realized it wasn't a helicopter or airplane.  at this time, object was no longer in our field of view, but other units reported loosing sight of object.  nobody indicated seeing it shoot off or anything... it just seemed to vanish.  ??
neither tank commander or myself were able to sleep that night.  we didn't even move the tank after that point.  we simply parked out in the open (on tank trail) and kept our eyes peeled until sunrise.  nothing else was seen.
there was lots of talk about it at refuelling/breakfast the next morning, but nobody ever figured out what it was, or could have been.  only thing like it i have ever seen.
as for the object itself... as i meantioned, it appeared disk shapped, yet it was very very dark out and whatever light we had seen in the distance that was so bright was no longer visible as it closed on us.  i don't remember seeing it turn off, but as it got closer, we could only see it through night vision via the beam coming out the bottom.  absolutely silent!  based on the rotating light beam, the object had to be at least 20-30 feet wide, but may have been larger.  it passed between us and the mountain range we call the south wall which wasn't more than a kilometer and a half away.  this was absolutely not something in the sky per say.  it was very low.  you could see the light beam hitting the ground beneath it which is why i say it was only 200-300 meters from us.  beam may have been infrared since it couldn't be seen with naked eye.
content.summary: Sighting during military training mission at fort irwin, california.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:00 pm i had walked out of my house via the backdoor to retrieve something from my vehicle.  i walked to the end of my little courtyard and turned to the left to go out the gate when i saw a very large v shape of lights moving from the west to the east.  directly over my house.  there were numerous clusters of lights in various colors, mostly white and red, but also a strange hint of a green color as well.  i watched it fly over my head at an altitude unknown to me, but it appeard to be very high up.  i noticed a couple of things while i watched it completely cross the sky above me.  

1) it was very big and although it wasnt making any type of manuvers (just flying in a straight path across the sky) it seemed to move effortlessly.

2) none of the lights blinked on it, and the lights themselves were large.  they were glowing more than anything.

3) it was very loud, and was a strange sound, different than anything i had heard before..

4) im not sure but i believe it had one lone light trailing in the distance, as if it could actually have been a diamond shape.  if it was actually shaped like a diamond, and the trailing light was attached to the large v cluster in the front, its big...

i watched as it faded away in the eastern distance, while still able to hear it i could no longer see it and i ran in the house to tell my wife what i had seen.

i wasnt sure what i had seen but i knew it was something i had never seen before.

the next night nothing happened.


the night after, at 10:00 approximately, i heard it from inside my house and ran out to look.  it was the same basic craft on the same exact path at what appeared to be the same altitude as the previous flight..

everything was the exact same, accept the clusters of lights were not as dense, or there werent as many lights on?  

i watched it fly over and went inside to tell me wife what i had seen.  she informed me that she had heard it from bed and that it was really loud inside the house..

nothing happened for several nights...


then at around 10:00 pm a few nights after the last sighting, i heard it from my living room again.  

i ran to the door and looked up and saw something different..

it was a perfect triangle.  1 huge white light at each corner and a equally large glowing, pulsing, red light in the middle...

it was on the same path as the previous two flights at what appeared to be the same speed and altitude.  it was apparent to me that if these were two different kinds of planes, they had a similar engine, or drive system based on the sound as it flew over..


i ran into the house to get my wife but she met me about halfway to the bedroom, saying she had heard it in bed and woken up.  we ran outside to see it dissapearing in the distance, having completely crossed the sky.  it was still very loud and my wife commented, based on the spread of the two lights we could see still, how big it must be..


that was it, hasnt happened since...


i hadnt really thought anymore about it until the incident in stephenville.  that got me lookin around on the internet where i came across a picture of the triangle shaped craft.  it is an artists rendition but it matches what i saw perfectly.  the other thing is, both my sighting and the ones in stephenville are in close proximity to military bases... the times that i saw it, it appeard to be heading for barksdale airforce base in shreveport, louisiana. i dont think its necessarilly an alien craft, i think its man made.
content.summary: 3 different events on three different nights within week in a half

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out at 9:00 pm on october 12, 2007.  i looked up at the sky because it was a clear and still night.  suddenly a bright light appeared in the western sky. it just appeared and there was no sound.  it wasn't as big as a full moon, i would say it was half that size.  it was a perfect circle and the brightest light i have ever seen.  the light was stationary and then moved east.  it stopped and i was looking straight up at it.  then it just got smaller and smaller like it was going straight up until it disappeared.  my dog and the neighborhood dogs began to bark.  i ran inside to get my husband.  we both went outside but nothing was there.  i looked in the paper the next day thinking someone must have seen this too.  it was too bright and too big for me to be the only one.  nothing was reported so i guess i may never know what it was.  during the time of seeing this object i never felt threatened or scared.  i just watched it in disbelief and wished someone was there with me to see it.
content.summary: Sudden bright light appeared then moved over me.  the light grew brighter then within seconds got smaller and smaller until it just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was witnessed by my wife, my wife's mother, and myself. we had just returned home around 10pm and as we got out of the car i noticed out in the south-western sky 3 round orb-like objects coming toward us. the sky was clear; no fog, the visibility was excellent. the objects were approx. 1/4 mile from us when they stopped; one object started rising and was dropping what looked like molten metal until it was out of sight. the next object shot straight up at a terrific speed and was gone in approx. 10 seconds. the next object came straight over our heads and stopped; this being only 75 feet over us; as a reference there is a power pole right where it stopped and it was only a few feet over that. by this time my wife's mother stated(she was about 70 years old at the time) that she is going into the house because she is "scared and does'nt know what to do if this thing lands"!!! my wife and i are still watching this thing and we notice that on the top of this craft there is a radar-like looking object turning around; kind of what one might see at an airport. this was the only sound we could hear coming from the object. it then started rising very slowly until it was gone. at this time we were saying to each other that no one will ever beleive what we just saw when another object shaped like a hexagon and being the size of a jumbo-jet pass right in front of us at approx. 500ft. no sound what-so-ever!!!It appeared to be tumbling in a clock-wise movement from south to north. i was so rattled by this event that the next day i went to the sheriff's office and told a deputy what we had seen. he asked if i would draw the objects we saw and to my astonishiment left and came back into the room and showed me 3 drawings of exactly the same things!! he said at that time that he would inquire to a few agency's about this and thats the last i heard about it. it's been about 10 years since it happened but we will never forget it!!
jerry hoffman
content.summary: 3 orb-like objects over vista,ca.

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to my shed to make sure that the doors were closed and it was dark of course so i was looking at the stars. nex to my house there is a field and off in the distance there is a power plant. i was looking that way and i saw a light. at first i thought it was an airplane but then i remembered that since 911 planes could not be that close to the plant.The object seemed to move up and down the erratically it went up  into the sky then back down to wear it was  i went in to get my binoculars. i came back outside to look at the object. in the lens i couls see the outline of one of the smoke stacks. then i saw the light. it seemed to be right beside the stack. after about five minutes i saw a flash were the object was in the sky and then the objectwas gone. after the event i felt almost peaceful and i dont really know why. also i started to walk into the field next to my house to get closer to the tree line were the stacks of smoke come from. this was odd because i never go outside into woods alone when its dark but i felt like i could take anything on after that experience
content.summary: Small light that flashed out of my sight

content.detailedDescription:
Witness statement from report form #1 ...... "i was in bed. heard drilling grinding noise. i sat up with my feet on the floor and saw 3 men standing in my bedroom with dark shades. i don't know why i wasn't afraid but i got up walked over to them and asked them what they were doing. there was a huge hole in my floor and they were looking down in it. there was very bright light and sounds of people working.....

one of them said they were looking for "fuel for our craft". after i told them to tell me what it is i may be able to help. he said the word antimony and showed me a picture of it on a surface (telepathic). it was a solid irregular shaped substance with the broken edges looking like sand, granular.....

i told them i didn't know what that is and looked over at my bed to see if i was alive or dead. when i looked back the men and the hole were gone.....

my granddaughter asked me later who was i talking to last night.....

after the men left i used the restroom and sat on my bed till the alarm went off trying to think about what had happened....."
content.summary: Strange nighttime visitors

content.detailedDescription: We had a family gathering for laber day weekend in dimmitt, texas.  late in the evening, about 15 of us agreed to go outside and watch for falling stars.  the night sky was clear and a perfect nigth for star gazing and looking for falling stars.  my daughter and i saw a faint cloud moving from the north.  i watched this cloud and noticed that it appeared more like a boomerang shape.  i got up from my chair and pointed to the object.  my daughter, who was sitting next to me, also got up and saw the object.  my wife, two brothers,,a newphew and neice also saw the the object.  the object made a right turn toward the west, which is the direction of new mexico, and then we lost tract of it.  we were all astonish.  we all described the same shape like object.  my wife and one brother said the object had white lights around the object.  the lights were symmetrical.  the object did not make any noise and  appeared to be the flying at a level as small private single engine plane.  the object did not leave any kind of vapor trail.
content.summary: Five family members witnessed a boomerang object in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
I am sending this to you from the philippines where i presently reside. the incident happened in california while i was on vacation visiting my parents.



i was walking on the beach in oceanside, california, sunday, september. it was around 4:45 pm. my then four year old son garreth was with me. we were at the water's edge. the sun was starting to get closer to the horizon. i happened to look back towards the cliff area. i saw this oval object that was over the row of a-frame cottages, yet it was below the cliff line and other houses behind it. if you do a google earth search for the area where the flying object sat, it would be latitude: 33���11'53.93"n and longitude:117���23'14.72"w. where i was standing on the water's edge was latitude: 33���11'55.62"n and longitude:117���23'20.90"w.

what attracted me to the object was a glimmer of light as if reflecting the sun's light into a mirror and then moving the mirror so that it would pulse. like using a mirror to send morse code. we walked closer to the object walking away from the water's edge. the object did not move. the light coming from it did all the moving. i could see the color of the light which to make a basic description, looked like gold spray paint sprayed onto water and then sloshed so that the gold "paint" would circle around inside the oval shape. gold spray paint has dark components in it especially if it is sprayed too thick ss this is as close to an example that i can offer.  imagine an oval tank filled with water, with underwater bright white lights inside the tank submerged and the thick gold "paint" material swirling around on top of the water as it won't mix with the water. there would be times when the "paint" was not too thick which allowed the light behind it to shine through making it brighter and darker as the "paint" material swirled around. the tank is on its side in this instance like a large picture frame. there was no pattern to the movement of the material inside the oval. random swirls as if stirred with a large spoon and then reversed its direction at will. very random. the object was the size of a large van. it was a windy day, there were seagulls flying a few yards from the object at palm tree level, and they were having a hard time negotiating the wind. the object was dead still. i at first thought it was a gag blimp or some type of kite. i looked for wires, there were none.  nothing short of billboard scaffolding could have suspended that large object over the cottage roofing to keep it from moving in the wind. there was no scaffolding. nothing extended from the a-frame cottages and nothing connected to the houses on the cliff above the object. still not wanting to believe this object was hanging there by itself, motionless, i moved closer. it was the same thing. no wires, no poles no metal trusses, not even an electric wire to supply power for the light effects. the object was facing the sun which was setting in a northwest position over the horizon. i moved closer to the object and noticed that behind the oval that was displaying the liquid light show, there was a turbine. yes a turbine that spun counterclockwise. looked like what you would see on a jet liner. there were light blue and pink lights coming out of the turbine as it spun. no specific light receptacles, just a flood of pastel colored lights coming out of the the area of the spinning vanes.  but there was no noise at all. i could not understand how light could be coming out of the turbine as there were no bulbs, reflectors, etc. it was mystical to say the least. there were other people at the beach picnic tables across the cottages, gathered around, at about 10 feet away from where i stood, and i looked at them to see if they had noticed the object. they never glanced at it. not even once as long as i stood there. made me think, is this a gag, and everybody else has already seen it and grown tired of it? a young boy crossed in front of my son and me as we stood across the row of cottages and i looked at him to see if he was viewing what we saw trying to get him to look up at the object. he looked at me and wondered why i was looking at him. he never looked up at the object. my son and i looked at the object for a good 30 minutes, the sun was still brightly shining. i had to leave to get the car home in time for my parents to go to 5 p.M. religious services. i was late. our car was parked on the street at the cliff line south of the cottages, quite a ways away from the oceanside amphitheater and from where the object hung in the air. we started to head towards the car but i kept looking back at the object and it was still there in the same position. i reluctantly got into the car and drove home. i usually have a video camera with me. i'm a recording artist with music videos on mtv asia. that day my brother had taken the video camera with him. of all the times to be without a camera. and to think my rock video garden of eden that aired all over asia on mtv asia and channel v from 1996 on, had famous pictures and video of "ufos" in it. i can still remember the object. i did not see any windows, any beings looking out, any doors, wings, tires. above all no motion and no noise whatsoever. no smell of fuel, aviation or otherwise, no fumes, no exhaust heat mirages, no heat. 
the gulls were the loudest thing at the scene. the turbine was molded onto the oval light frame. if i had not stepped to one side i would not have noticed the turbine. it had dimension. it was a solid object. whatever it was seemed to only be seen by myself and my son. this object was at rooftop of the one story cottages. the red cottages are still there on the beach access road at oceanside beach, and can be seen on google earth. it was not a misty hazy apparition. it was well defined, unmistakably within close reach and in more than  enough broad daylight to tell it was hanging there. it was definitely a flying machine. i have no idea where it came from. it had no letters, graphics, markings at all. i did not see it leave as i left before it did. i went back the next day and it was gone. i wish i had stayed till the object disappeared. i wish i had video footage of it. i wonder why it showed itself to me and not to the others on the beach. 

i have included a crude rendering of the object to at least give a visual of what we saw and in case someone else has seen this same object and reports or has reported it, for posterity.

the side of the flashing "blimp" side is not exactly the way i saw it but the white and black and gold "liquid" lines are there to give an idea of what it was doing as it pulsed which was swirling in random waves. the color of the pulsing blimp was less intense as the rendering suggests and almost going towards a black and white version or as if the color had been dialed down to just a hint of color. the rendering is not really accurate. the turbine is as close as i could come up with using infini_d in which i'm not really proficient. the overall look of the object is similar to as rendered. if i had access to a real artist, perhaps a closer picture of the object could be achieved. i'm wanting to fill in the portion of the blimp that connects to the turbine to give it a molded look as the blimp molds into the turbine.The turbine had a housing that extended to the rear as it sat alongside the blimp part of the object but i could not draw it into the rendering and would then be construed as a cigar shaped part as regards the turbine. since the object  as you can see this is an usual looking object. i wish i had thought to go around the rear of the object but i was pressed for time. if i have already reported this incident to your group, then here it is with a rendering.. with regards to the total number of witnesses it should read 7 to 10 people including my son and myslef but since i did not sense they were looking at the object i have to report two witnesses as myself and my son. i know it's strange but that's what happened that day while viewing the object.
content.summary: Flashing blimp shaped object hovering over cottages at oceanside beach california usa

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling northbound on my way to work that morning.  the road visibility was excellent but the skies were overcast and the sunlight had not broken the dark, grey cloud cover.  as i was going to make a left turn to the main gate entrance, i saw five lights in the sky. they were bright and white, very low to the ground,and traveling north.  the lights were arranged in a some sort "v" shape, but it looked like a backwards checkmark.  also, i could here no sound coming from the lights.  i then decided to go up to the main office since it is at a higher elevation, but when i got there i did not see the lights again. 

i told some of my co workers about the sighting but they just laughed at me and did not take it seriously, except for one.
content.summary: Big lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Attached is a new assessment of the analysis on the al-fe alloy supposedly recovered from the 1897 aurora tx debris field.  from a scientific standpoint the 1973 mufon investigation was hopelessly bungled.  when any 'evidence' is removed from a site without verifiable archealogical controls applied it becomes useless.  this is the case of the metal samples discussed in the 1973 documentation.

of all the metal samples discussed, the only one that is truly anomalous (not from normal agricultural activity) is the al-fe alloy sample.  in my document, i review the 1973 metallurgical analysis and conclude that this is truly an advanced alloy that should not have been in this field.  given the publicity-seeking goals of the 'investigators' at the time it is likely that this sample was planted as a hoax.

if it were not a hoax-- and was actually found in the aurora 'debris field'-- then i am confident there must be more of this material, likely in larger quantities but dispersed in much smaller particles.  they may be very small, like grains of sand, but most importantly they would not be found by a metal detector and should still be at that site.  luckily this is not something easily hauled off or planted, and may still offer a chance to at last have a real scientifically verifiable study of this site. 

-anonymous
content.summary: Metallurgical analysis - new review  - aurora tx

content.detailedDescription:
A flash of extremely bright light, rather broad in width, and short in height, was captured on a digital infrared game camera.  this camera has been active for several weeks and placed in a stationary (fixed) position facing northwestern direction, where camera images are primarily targeted to capture photos of deer, turkey and other game in the area.  this flash of light was captured on two consecutive camera images.  there are no vehicular traffic or other modes of transportation available within view of this camera since this unit is located in a wooded area hundreds of yards away from the nearest highway.  additionally, the unidentified images are clearly seen at tree top level, and not in the line of sight of rising or setting sun.

these photos were taken duting the same period of time as the ufo sightings occurred over stephenville, tx.  this camera is located 45-miles southwest of stephenville.  

after reviewing the images on this camera several times and, being cognitive of the recent ufo sightings over stephenville, comanche and other nearby communities, the occurrance of the images observed were rather stange, and never before observed before or since the sightings over stephenville.  just thought other curious and inquisitive minds might like to know?  still, the mystery remains....What are the unexplained images observed in the photos, and, could these same images be linked to the sightings seen be by people in stephenville?  

one last note: the date was incorrected set and the time of day was in error, too, as this discrepency was noted when the camera was checked on january 19, 2008. however, the fact still stands that the images show an unexplained image which have yet to be duplicated.  any objectionable explanations are welcomed!
content.summary: Flash of light at tree top level taken with deer camera attached to tree

content.detailedDescription: Around 3:35 i went to pick up my daughter at chisolm trail intermediate school. i also picked up my son and his friend from fossil hill middle school. as we were going to drop off my son' friend roman velasquez on appleyard street my daughter notice that the sun appeared to be very bright with unidentified spots around it. we also noticed odd rays. my daughter quickly ran into the house to grab the camera to take pictures of what we witnessed. we couldnt believe what we were seeing at the time. we had no idea what it could have been but we had never seen anything like it. we walked back into the house to review some of the pictures, we decided we wanted to take more pictures of the object but as we went back outside the object had dissapeared.
content.summary: Ufo in sky around 3:45. sky appeared to be very bright.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving west on mcfarland ranch road in parker county.  we thought we were seeing a meteorite fall to the western horizon, but right above the horizon it stopped.  it had been going very fast.  we stopped the car and got out to look.  the light flew all around the western and southern sky.  it would go very fast and make right angle turns, and go up and down.  i said, "it must be an airplane of some sort." my friend with me said, "when have you ever seen an airplane do that?"  it had no other lights on it, like red and green port and starboard lights on an airplane.  it was just a brassy redish colored light.  it flew very fast in the northern sky, and started coming towards us, hovering, no noise.  my friend got scared and wanted to go, she said, "that thing is looking at us!"  i felt the same way.  it was maybe two or three hundred yards from us.  was hard to tell.  we got in the car to take off, and the light went north at a high rate of speed. we didn't see it after that.  it really left an impression on us.  this happened some time in the summer of 1975 to the best of my recollection.  we didn't know who to report this to.  i come foward now because of the sightings in stephenville.  i would like to know if there were other sightings here in texas at the time we saw our u.F.O.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We thought we had seen a meteorite,

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation in breckenridge with my family and took photos on dec 6 2007.  a few days ago, i was looking at them and noticed something in the photographs. 

as i zoomed in, it is obvious that i caught an unidentified flying object on film. 

you have to see these photos.  

i didn't notice the object at the time i took these photos.  

the object looks like a bell shape.  you can clearly see the bottom of it.  in one of the photos you can see a tail or streak following it. 

you can also see where it went through the white streak/cloud of an airplane.  

i have not erased the chip that these photos are on.  i truly think this is something.  i'm not one to fabricate things.  i do believe this is something special. 

i'm not willing to share these photos until i speak with someone directly.  

thanks!
content.summary: I discovered this object in my vacation photos.  it's very clear

content.detailedDescription:
I realise it's late to be reporting on this, but i'm surprised that i can't find any reference to the event anywhere on the net.

one evening in 1985 ( give or take a year ) my brother was walking to a nearby store, he then saw some people looking above their heads, he then spotted a gigantic dense black triangular shape in the dark evening sky. he told me at the time that he had the impression that it's size was like several football fields across.  my brother was an auditor working for the local authority at the time and did not want to report it, but dozens of others did, and the story made the front page of the south wales evening post the following day.

his account of the event was that it moved across the sky very slowly in a westerly direction with nothing audible coming from it. 

we have both been to air-shows in the uk in the seventies and seen the raf vulcan bomber in flight, whatever he saw in his own words would have been 50 times the size and silent.

the weather was calm and clear that night.
content.summary: Huge triangular shaped craft moving slowly across swansea bay area.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i had been fishing up in the high sierras all day and had just settled into camp, which was fairly secluded at approximately 10,000 feet. we ate some of our catch and had begun settling around the campfire. the stars had just started to come out and my friend noted two bright stars off in the horizon and said "look, twin stars." we first did not pay much attention to them and then looked back at them to see them in the same place. a couple minutes passed and we noticed that they had moved. when we payed closer attention to them we could see that they were moving in unison. however, unlike satellites, they did not follow an arc, but rather moved in a straight line in our direction. by no means did we believe that they were headed for us, they were quite far off in the distance, but they did seem to move straight and nearing us. their movement was unwaivering, slow and steady. when they had covered about a quarter of the sky they immediately changed direction and took off very quickly 90degrees perpendicular to what had been their course. the change in course was so smooth and quick it was amazing. for us, it was obvious that there was nothing normal about what we had just witnessed. in retrospect  we had initially had seen the objects hovering in distance for several minutes, then the movement in unison was our initial indication that something was odd. further, the movement was not like any satellite, and the fact that they had moved so well together and had been hovering far off in the distance for at least what we had known to be a few minutes. then the abrupt change in direction and the speed at which they took off together was further evidence that we had witnessed something abnormal.
content.summary: Two starlike objects moved in unison across 1/4 of the horizon then immediately changed direction and took off upwards

content.detailedDescription:
Witness statement: from report form #1

i was in my backyard with my 3 kids sitting on our trampoline watching a movie (husband had set up a screen and projector).

my two older kids and i saw a bright green light that seemed to be over my neighbors backyard.

it moved quickly from my right to left & then disappeared
content.summary: Neon green orb over neighbors house

content.detailedDescription: I was attending a halloween party at a private home. i think it was a sat. night. i had no alcohol at all. i was outside on clematis st., talking with others facing me. i looked up in the sky and saw the saucer plain as day, suspended there, and as soon as i caught sight of it it sped away, disappearing as it went. it either had a cloaking type of device or the clouds enveloped it. noone else saw it. i was too afraid they would think i was "nuts." i just stood there, probably saying, "oh my g-d" a few times if i remember that correctly. the only thing i could have been was some sophisticated, rather large hologram someone was using for a halloween stunt. no idea if possible. it was very plain that it was like a traditional ufo saucer. have always wondered if anyone else saw this. didn't know until now to make the report. someone else i know (a professional) said they had a very similar encounter-not the same date (don't know where and when).
content.summary: Clear, large saucer with bright green lights all around seen just below cumulus clouds stationary at 1st then moved very swiftly and disappeared into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
First sighting:
 mid summer, chrystal clear moonless night.Five of us walking up to the club house on the highest point in sound beach the highest point in the area on the north shore of long island.
 i was 15 at the time (too young to drive)when i became aware of a diamond formation of what appeared to be 4 bright stars(brighter than the background) in a diamond formation with a brighter star dead center of the formation.
 i was an aviation buff and had some experience with aircraft performance.
 i called attention to the phenomenon and we all watched the motionless formation for several minutes.
 suddenly, the four bright points forming the perimeter of the diamond accelerated, linearly, to the four points of the compass, while the brightest,center point disappeared to what appeared to be straight up.
 shortly, the sound of a fighter jet became evident. the sound appeared to come from the direction(south) of the(then) west hampton beach afb.
 the aircraft showed no nav. lights, circled several times, then exited the area to the south.
 shortly thereafter the five point formation reappeared from the direction to which the had exited.
 unfortunately i do not remember how much longer they lingered.
second sighting:
 same summer possibly two weeks later, two of us sitting on the cliffs overlooking long island sound when two what appeared to be bright stars appeared from over the horizon over the connecticut shore heading straight at us south/south, east at a very rapid rate of speed.( the vehicle on the right was leading the one on the left)
 when the objects appeared to be over mid long island sound they made high speed right angle turns to the left heading east/north east and quickly disappeared into the darkness over the far east end of long island sound, much faster than any of '50s aircraft.
i reported this to the then bluebook program with no results.
content.summary: Five objects in formation, than two objects in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from lipan, december 28th about 7:30 pm ...It was overcast and dark and i notice the ground flickering, like a strobe lite and it made me look up and see two distinct circles of white just sitting there..They started to move and then just disappeared, moving toward the se. i thought i had seen a falling star or even some kind of falling depris. i was close to home and told my son that i had seen a falling star or meteor, as i have seen alot of them over the years, but has never expereinced the strobe effect that caught my attention in the first place. i didn't think much more about it but when the news broke on our local tv stations about all the sightings over stephenville. it made me re-think about that night.I even called my neighbors who were behind me that night about a 1/2 mile and they did not see them. but i saw them.
i live close to where hood, palo pinto and erath come together.
i don't think it was a falling star as they move horizonal thru the sky and the strobe effect was effected in getting my attention. i was not fearful but awed in it all. 
i know what i saw that night and if i can help in anyway..Let me know.
content.summary: Strobe effect on pasture..Looked up..Saw 2 white glowing circles..Moved toward southeast and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure of the exact time. my wife and i had made a trip to a local store. on our way home (4 blocks) we were crossing grand ave. as i looked left (west) for traffic, i saw several strange lights not far above the horizon. the lights were partially obscured by a two story building about 4 blocks away.

i stopped in the middle of grand ave., blocking traffic and told my wife to look and pointed towards the lights. she looked and saw the lights also.

when i first saw them, they looked like white fireworks (without the trailing flame) coming up from the ground. as we watched them, they appeared to fly around one another very quickly and randomly. we watched them for a little more than a minute and they just disappeared, like turning off a light switch.

my wife was amazed at what she had witnessed. i have seen similar lights in the area many times over the last 15 years. i worked for five years as an air traffic controller, mostly in a control tower at night. i can quite confidently state that these were not any known aircraft. i cannot estimate a size, but judging by how large they appeared in contrast to the building they were partially behind and not knowing how much further away they were, each individual light was much too large to be any type of known aircraft. if the lights were all part of a single unit then it would have been more massive than any craft i have ever seen or studied, including the zepplins and other lighter than air giants.

approximately 15-20 minutes after we observed the lights, i saw a couple of small jet aircraft in the same area (this after arriving home). the contrast between the small jets and the strange lights is staggering. it would be like comparing the size of grapefruit to a raisin.
content.summary: 5 large quickly moving lights
